text: Metachroma suturale is a species of leaf beetle. It is found in the United States, ranging from Arizona to Texas. Its length is between 4.8 and 6.4 mm. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles described in 1858 Category:Taxa named by John Lawrence LeConte
title: Metachroma suturale
